name: Cooking World: Kitchen Story
description:
Cooking World takes you to a thrilling and mouthwatering adventure of restaurant management, dish preparation and amazing food recipes! With a choice of 7 different restaurant locations, delight your customers by cooking and serving wonderful dishes, from burgers and fries to coffee and cakes and even seafood! Upgrade and decorate your restaurant and become the best restaurateur in the world!

Features:

- Over 200 dishes to cook and serve!
- 7 unique restaurant locations plus mini-games!
- More than 200 levels to complete!
- Dozens of quests to complete!
- Hundreds of upgrades for your restaurant
- Hundreds of wacky customers
- Guaranteed fun for everyone!

Are you ready to become the best restaurateur in the world?
